import React,{useState, Fragment} from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company:'', website:'', location:'', status:'', skills:'', githubusername:'', bio:'', twitter:'', facebook:'', linkedin:'', youtube:'', instagram:'' }); const [displaySocialInputs, toogleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs &&
} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default connect()(CreateProfile)
